job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: Stilt YC W16 is building a bank focused on 45 million immigrants in the US Immigrants are traditionally shut out of the financial system because they lack a financial identity We are building technology to democratize access to financial servicesbrbrImproving access to financial services for everyone especially for the underserved and immigrants has never been more important They contribute 16T to the economy have built many 100B companies and generated millions of jobs Still immigrants dont get the services they deserve We are building technology to help immigrants from day 1 of their arrival Since launch we have helped hundreds of thousands of immigrants from 160 countries We are growing fast and now at an inflection point in our journey to help millions of immigrantsbrbrWe are based in San Francisco open to remote founded by an immigrant team with expertise in finance technology and machine learning 70 of the team is immigrants and from underrepresented backgrounds We are working hard to make financial services simple by using nontraditional data building a modern scoring and decision engine and improving operational efficiencybrbrIt is a challenging and fulfilling opportunity for someone looking to make a difference in the lives of immigrants across the world As we rewrite the approach to banking we are looking for a Data Scientist who is experienced knowledgeable and believes in making this happen with usbrbrstronguResponsibilitiesbrustrongul liContinuously explore new alternative data sources to add incremental predictiveness in the models though orthogonal signalsfeaturesli liBuild end to end machine learning models from design learning evaluation validation amp monitoringli liCreate expand explore rank amp maintain logs of innovative internal feature sets for credit pricing amp fraudli liExpand the performance data using organic amp synthetic methods wherever possibleli liDevelop automation capabilities amp advanced dashboards required for faster processing and monitoringli liOwn end to end model implementation model iteration model versioning for production and sandbox environmentli liCollaborate with the engineering and product teams to implement ship test and monitor the risk modelsli brbrulstronguRequirementsbrustrongul liQuantitative Background Bachelors preferably Masters degree in Computer Science Statistics Mathematics Financial Engineering etcli liProgramming Ability Expert knowledge of Python or R amp SQL Experience using cloud technologies AWS GCP and distributed datacomputing toolsli liProficiency in writing and maintaining production level code You will ship what you writeli liML Delivery Experience Built key ML systems from large raw data to production amp scaled monitored amp improved it over 13 years Right candidate with more experience 36 years can also be considered for senior positionli liStatistical Mindset Understanding of the right tools for a given data analysis Focussed on model selection interpretability biases explainability amp monitoringli liData Friendly Revel in data cleaning feature engineering amp data generationli liClear Communicator Able to collaborate across functions and explain difficult concepts in written visual amp verballi liSelf Organized Belief in data amp code reviewversioning reproducible work with clearconcise documentationli liSelf Starter Willing to quickly learn new things test amp share with the teamli brbrulustrongBenefitsbrstronguul liThe opportunity to collaborate with a team of creative fun and driven colleagues on products that have an immediate and significant impact on peoples livesli liCompetitive Compensationli liComprehensive medical dental and vision coverageli li401kliul
